document.full_text: jesuits in the pacific northwest have agreed to pay $166.1 million to hundreds of american indians and alaska natives who were abused at the catholic order's schools.
document.title: jesuits settle abuse claims for $166 million
lines_and_colors: jesuits in the pacific northwest have agreed to pay $166.1 million to hundreds of american indians and alaska natives who were abused at the catholic order's schools.
